channel.title: Devolution Enhanced V2
channel.description:
As several people have been having problems with my first release of Devolution Enhanced, I have decided to release the work I have done so far, as version 2.
[code][VERSION 1] [11/23/11] * Downloaded Devolution v7 from RageZone * Updated Eclipse from the older version I had * Started working on fixing Errors/Warnings
[11/24/11] * Successfully fixed every Error/Warning showing in Eclipse * Began packaging the Server * Finished packaging the server * Organized the Config folder (Now data)
[11/25 - 11/27] * Grounded >.<
[11/27/11] * Added a skills package and a couple skill bases * Removed Devolution's Firemaking, in favor of a simpler base * Removed Devolutions Premium handlers * Added a Constants class, for future quick editing of the server * Added Admin and mod String[] 's, loading on login * Applied every dupe patch released (Special thanks to shoopdawhoop) * Formatted every file, and removed all of the unnecessary notes (except Client.java, just too many for now) * Began work on an NPCAnimation file, not finished yet (Thanks killamess) * Finished NPCAnimations! No file though, went through NPCHandler
[VERSION 2] [11/28/11] * Added Grahams Cycle based Task manager to the server
[11/29/11] * Handled Crafting/Firemaking using the Task manager (Boy this is wierd, too used to Scu11's tick system, I guess) * Handled Commands * Added a few more variables to the Constants class * Fixed up Item.java, removed every item past the 317 revision, and listed the items in order of least -> greatest
[11/30/11] * Fixed NPC Animation bugs * Started work on a Packet handling system, removed it temporarily to release what I have as v2 * Cleaned up Client.java a bit, decided to release as v2 since people were experiencing problems[/code]
[b]Links[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/14753651/Devolution%20Enhanced.zip]Dropbox[/url][/li] [li][url=http://uppit.com/bgp5y0pdo9h2/Devolution_Enhanced.zip]Uppit[/url][/li][/ul] Like I said in my previous thread, I realize that this will not be popular, and most of you will flame this. But I am releasing it for those who want it.
If anyone experiences problems with this, feel free to PM me.
[b][u]Media, so I don't get infracted ;D [/u][/b] [img]http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/4264/91876882yt3.png[/img][img]http://[url=http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/4264/91876882yt3.png]http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/4264/91876882yt3.png[/url][/img] [img]http://[url=http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/4264/91876882yt3.png]http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/4264/91876882yt3.png[/url][/img]

item.title: Devolution Enhanced V2
item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:
@Nicholas2 wrote:

[quote=“Eternal Knights, post:2, topic:423659”]Thanks man, I love your work. I’m glad you released this, I will let you know if I have any problems. I would rep++ if I could, but sadly I can’t… 10/10 for using devolution!

Edit: I still can’t attack anything, but I’m sure its a problem on my end. I know you said you tested it out, and I do believe you. I still love this source because it truly is an enhanced Devolution. I don’t have a problem with other Devolution bases, it seems to be a problem with my client. Maybe, not sure. Do you have a client that works with this?[/quote]

I included a client with this.

oldschool-scape:

are those heads, nulls???

Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced V2
item.dc:creator: @Eternal_Knights Eternal Knights
item.description:
@Eternal_Knights wrote:

Thanks man, I love your work. I’m glad you released this, I will let you know if I have any problems. I would rep++ if I could, but sadly I can’t… 10/10 for using devolution!

Edit: I still can’t attack anything, but I’m sure its a problem on my end. I know you said you tested it out, and I do believe you. I still love this source because it truly is an enhanced Devolution. I don’t have a problem with other Devolution bases, it seems to be a problem with my client. Maybe, not sure. Do you have a client that works with this?

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced V2
item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:
@Nicholas2 wrote:

As several people have been having problems with my first release of Devolution Enhanced, I have decided to release the work I have done so far, as version 2.

[code][VERSION 1]
[11/23/11]

  • Downloaded Devolution v7 from RageZone
  • Updated Eclipse from the older version I had
  • Started working on fixing Errors/Warnings

[11/24/11]

  • Successfully fixed every Error/Warning showing in Eclipse
  • Began packaging the Server
  • Finished packaging the server
  • Organized the Config folder (Now data)

[11/25 - 11/27]

  • Grounded >.<

[11/27/11]

  • Added a skills package and a couple skill bases
  • Removed Devolution’s Firemaking, in favor of a simpler base
  • Removed Devolutions Premium handlers
  • Added a Constants class, for future quick editing of the server
  • Added Admin and mod String[] 's, loading on login
  • Applied every dupe patch released (Special thanks to shoopdawhoop)
  • Formatted every file, and removed all of the unnecessary notes
    (except Client.java, just too many for now)
  • Began work on an NPCAnimation file, not finished yet (Thanks killamess)
  • Finished NPCAnimations! No file though, went through NPCHandler

[VERSION 2]
[11/28/11]

  • Added Grahams Cycle based Task manager to the server

[11/29/11]

  • Handled Crafting/Firemaking using the Task manager
    (Boy this is wierd, too used to Scu11’s tick system, I guess)
  • Handled Commands
  • Added a few more variables to the Constants class
  • Fixed up Item.java, removed every item past the 317 revision, and
    listed the items in order of least -> greatest

[11/30/11]

  • Fixed NPC Animation bugs
  • Started work on a Packet handling system, removed it temporarily
    to release what I have as v2
  • Cleaned up Client.java a bit, decided to release as v2 since people
    were experiencing problems[/code]

Links

[ul][li]Dropbox[/li]
[li]Uppit[/li][/ul]
Like I said in my previous thread, I realize that this will not be popular, and most of you will flame this. But I am releasing it for those who want it.

If anyone experiences problems with this, feel free to PM me.

Media, so I don’t get infracted ;D
